about_the_game:
BUILD

Enjoy the redefined building system, where each block has four different heights for you to pick freely. Find various objects and blocks all over the world, across numerous unique biomes.

CHOOSE YOUR DESTINY

Explore the Endless Paths: Winter, Hell, and Possessed. Fight monsters, and bosses, and collect loot. The further you go, the bigger the challenge, and the better the drops. If you don’t feel like fighting, pick the Neutral Path and enjoy beautiful, nature landscapes.

FIGHT

Play as a Warrior, Archer, or Mage, and switch these with no limitations. Weapons define your skill pool; learn new skills with leveling. Change all the gear on the fly, fighting dozens of monsters and other players with PvP on.

CUSTOMIZE

Express yourself with hundreds of cosmetic items just waiting for you.

UPGRADE

Do you want a Legendary Ice Dragon Bow that ignites enemies and poisons them? Sure, build up your gear just as you like and find your favorite playstyle. Combine different methods to upgrade your equipment and dominate the enemies.

MAKE THE ARMY

Obtain Defender Statues to spawn NPCs that will follow you and obey your commands. They can assist in fighting, protecting areas, and gathering resources. Dress them and share the gear for the best results.

FIND YOUR PLACE

Do you want to have your own useful, safe place that you can always rest in? Just put a Home Totem anywhere and enjoy protection from all sources. Decorate your new home, decide how players can interact with it, and invite friends.

JOIN A GUILD OR START ONE

Consider joining a guild or creating one on your own. You will then have a large place with protection from all the non-member players and other dangers. Fight other Guilds for the title of the best of them all.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS

Use the Quickteam System to create an in-game group with friends in no time. Choose a name for your team and invite your fellows. Enjoy limitless teleportation, shared experience drop, viewing your friends’ health, and many more bonuses.

Craft any object, obtain pets and mounts, customize your skills, mine crystals, trade, take quests, visit new towns, and find out what else is waiting for you.


Do what you truly like: welcome to the game that fits your mood no matter what!
Join Early Access HERE and meet us in .

We can’t wait to have you on the board!
TwoPow

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Cubox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Cubox is a 3D MMORPG with a procedurally generated open world. Build, fight, and discover!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian
